home.s_tit:
Waiting for a new family of
'Nexon Small Library' full of fun.
home.main_section2:
The Nexon small library gives children the pleasure of reading books and provides them with a place to develop creative ideas by reading books with friends.

The magical place that makes reading enjoyable,

Nexon Small Library

  • Introduction
  • Program
  • Application
  • Story
home.main_section3:
Nexon Small Library also supportsvarious programs tohelp children becomeinterested in reading books.

  • The library at Timothy Regional Children’s Center used the high bookshelves to create a spatial division, and the divided spaces became a comfort zone for children.
  • The library, such as forest and sea in the Imjado Hope Children's Center, provides children with a warm and comfortable environment that feels like they are in nature.
  • 1930년대 담배 집하장으로 지어졌던 공간이 어린이들의 상상대로 리모델링되어 아침해지역아동센터의 멋진 책방이 되었습니다.
  • The library at Nowon Yettrang Children's House was designed with a car concept that infants and toddlers like. With assembled cushions, children can use it for a variety of purposes.

Nexon Small Library

A project to create a place for children to grow their dreams and hopes through books

more

Nexon Small Library also supportsvarious programs to helpchildren become interestedin reading books.

  • Children share their thoughts with their friends while reading a book with reading guide teachers.
  • Of your own feelings and thoughts I felt after reading the book helps expressed in a variety of ways.
  • Children develop the power to think with their friends through discussions, discussions and presentations.
  • It is difficult and uncomfortable to express your thoughts at first, but soon you will feel easy and fun.

Imaginary Seed Reading Program

A program that develops the power of thought by reading books with a teacher

more

Nexon Small Library also supports variousprograms to helpchildren becomeinterested in reading books.

  • The award experience in this area is an unforgettable memories for children, we hope to get confident about reading a book writing.
  • We provide cultural performances such as plays and magic shows to small library children gathered from all over the country.
  • We display Award-winning works so that we can see ideas and expressions of other friends.
  • The awards ceremony at the Nexon office provides children with a fun and exciting time by preparing various programs that children like.

Book Report Contest

It is a festival that praises children's book report and gives them confidence in writing.

more

Nexon Small Libraryalso supportsvarious programs tohelp children becomeinterested in reading books.

  • Located in Mongolia, the 7th Foreign Small Library is a 130-square-meter two-story building that serves as a library and communication center in the area.
  • In order for the opening ceremony to be pleasantly remembered by the children, we have various activities such as mini-exercise and swimming pool visits.
  • The opening ceremony of the small book store is accompanied by game users and Nexon employees to hold cultural exchange sessions with local children.
  • It is designed according to children's eye level to be a pleasant and warm space that always wants to come.

Overseas Nexon Small Library

A space where children’s dream come true all over the world

more

home.main_section5:
Story

Now in Nexon Small Library, children’s dreams are going.

More

2018 The Final Imaginary Seed Reading Program

Opportunity to get acquainted with books! 'Imagin Seed Reading Program' is a program that receives instruction from a professional reading instructor once a week for 5 months...

becoming a wonderful Small library for the 'Morning-Sun' local children’s center.
